messages.title: A decade of Lib Dem action for Sheffield
messages.content: The Lib Dems have a proud record of working hard for local people in Sheffield

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting a further £400 for working people by increasing the personal allowance to £12,500
Balancing the budget while protecting vital local services
More money for the NHS and protecting education spending

issues.environment: Campaigning to protect and improve Sheffield's parks and green spaces
issues.health: More money for the NHS and protecting education spending

politicalExperience.achievements: Brought to save 400 jobs in local industry. Includes persuading a FTSE-100 engineering firm to stay in the city against competition from another site. Successfully persuaded the council governors to commit to rebuild the road. Helped hundreds of local people with a huge range of issues and problems.

images.caption: Fixing Sheffield's crumbling roads for good.
Campaigning to protect and improve Sheffield's parks and green spaces.
